mapper.select: SELECT id, stdn_id as stdnId, rdate, start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime, is_attend as isAttend FROM attd WHERE stdn_id = #{stdnId} AND rdate = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attd (id, stdn_id, rdate, is_attend) VALUES (attd_seq.NEXTVAL, #{stdnId},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.MM.dd'), #{isAttend})
